name: Warp Back Home
description:
Warp Back Home - Getting home, try after try.

Warp Back Home is a simple game with an arcade feel.

Command your space ship off the planet and get to the warp point. Wait, we forgot one small detail. Your ship isn't powerful enough to get off the planet. What are you to do? Re-engineer it!

Fly, learn, fix the weak points, repeat.

Eventually, maybe you'll get back home. Maybe.

Oh, good sound. The music in this game is amazing. That too.

Features:

  • Simple controls, anyone can play the game!
  • Simple graphics, anyone can run the game!
  • Simple premise, don't get lost in story!
  • Simple sounds, get lost in the music instead!
  • Did we mention simplicity?
  • At least 5 seconds of gameplay, guarenteed!
  • Mild levels of replayability!
  • SPAAAAAACE!
